author: DickyChant
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44686 

Introducing pileup profiles for RunIII2022Summer24 and RunIII2023Summer24 MC compaigns for re-reco MC

#### PR validation:

Tested with CMSSW runtests

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Since this PR will be used for 2022 and 2023 MC re-reco campaigns, it is intended to be packported to 14_0_X (as described in [recent PPD news](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1441706/contributions/6067243/attachments/2909148/5103743/24-08-08_News_PPD.pdf)
title: [14_0_X] pileup profiles for RunIII2022Summer24 and RunIII2023Summer24 MC compaigns (backport)
